catentdesc.name: Hermitage Collection Double-Breasted Pea Coat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Waist-length wool coat with stylish double collar
catentdesc.longdescription: Look great and stay warm in this modern take on the traditional pea coat. The removable top collar adds style and warmth. 100% wool with a silky lining. Cut shorter and roomier than the traditional pea coat, this coat is great for travel.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Casual Leather Jacket
catentdesc.longdescription: This casual leather jacket is made with super-soft lamb leather. The liner is removable so you can wear this coat for at least three seasons. Wool-lined pockets keep your hands warm.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Diablo Racing Jacket
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fitted snap-front leather racing jacket with shoulder detail
catentdesc.longdescription: Accented with buckle straps on the shoulder and stylish topstitch details, this buffed calfskin jacket has attitude. Features an ultra-thin, zip-out quilted liner for added warmth.

catentdesc.name: Albini Black Leather Aviator
catentdesc.shortdescription: The classic aviator jacket is back in black
catentdesc.longdescription: Made from the softest lamb leather, this chic jacket is great for both city streets and country strolls. Features inside and outside pockets, zip front, and back vent for added comfort.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Belted Cotton Trench
catentdesc.longdescription: Tortoise-shell-look buttons and buckle accent this stylish spring jacket. The shell is 100% worsted anti-wrinkle cotton, and the lining is 100% polyester.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Mufasa Pea Coat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Elegant double-breasted pea coat with double front pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: This jacket is deceptively light despite the ultra-warm 100% wool exterior Features two upper slit pockets and two lower flap pockets. Looks great throughout the winter months, for work or casual wear.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Ribbed Collar Leather Bomber
catentdesc.shortdescription: Chocolate leather jacket with buckled epaulettes
catentdesc.longdescription: Rugged and handsome, this fitted bomber is inspired by the rebel in all of us. Features a zipped front with snaps and soft cotton ribbed collar.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Classic Aviator
catentdesc.longdescription: Buttoned leather straps on shoulders and sleeves add style to this classic jacket. Features micro fleece inner panels for added warmth and faux-fur pocket liners. Ribbed cotton collar and cuffs.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Flannel Blazer
catentdesc.longdescription: This single-breasted sport coat is versatile and smart. Made of a luxurious wool and cashmere blend, this blazer is soft and comfortable. Short enough to show off your favorite jeans.

catentdesc.name: Albini Urban Dweller Jacket
catentdesc.shortdescription: Military-inspired jacket with a mandarin collar
catentdesc.longdescription: Look sharp and stay warm in this chic 100% wool blazer. Extra large breast pockets and shoulder details add flair. The brushed bronze buttons complete the look.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Montana Suede Jacket
catentdesc.shortdescription: Comfortable and casual zip-front jacket with slit pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: This updated bomber jacked is made of luxuriously soft tan suede that falls loosely for a casual look. Features a funnel collar and extra-roomy sleeves.

catentdesc.name: Albini Cashmere Sport Coat
catentdesc.longdescription: Simple luxury. This ultra-comfortable sport coat is a remarkably soft wool/cashmere blend, with brushing to create a subtle nap. Looks great with a turtleneck or dress shirt.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Porter Coat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Fitted black jacket with breast pockets and epaulettes
catentdesc.longdescription: Look chic and distinguished in this form-fitting, military-style jacket with buttoned exterior pockets. Made from 60% cotton, 40% wool, it is fully lined and machine washable.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Black Leather Short Coat
catentdesc.shortdescription: Waist-length soft leather jacket with pockets
catentdesc.longdescription: A great casual jacket that you can wear to work or out on the town. Made from Italian leather and lined with printed silk. Features back side vents and hand warmer pockets.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Tweed Bomber
catentdesc.shortdescription: An ultra-warm winter jacket with a fur-lined hood
catentdesc.longdescription: This short and stylish tweed jacket is down filled to keep you warm. Features leather and zipper detailing. The ribbed waist and cuffs keep out the cold.
